description: Contains the Rules that identify the requests that you want to allow, block, or count. In a WebACL, you also specify a default action (ALLOW or BLOCK), and the action for each Rule that you add to a WebACL, for example, block requests from specified IP addresses or block requests from specified referrers. You also associate the WebACL with a CloudFront distribution to identify the requests that you want AWS WAF to filter. If you add more than one Rule to a WebACL, a request needs to match only one of the specifications to be allowed, blocked, or counted.. Source:- https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-resource-providers-wafv2.git

Body.description: The body of a web request. This immediately follows the request headers.
Body.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLBodyDefinition

DefaultAction.description: Default Action WebACL will take against ingress traffic when there is no matching Rule.
DefaultAction.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLDefaultActionDefinition

ExcludedRule.description: Excluded Rule in the RuleGroup or ManagedRuleGroup will not be evaluated.
ExcludedRule.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLExcludedRuleDefinition

RuleActionOverride.description: Action override for rules in the rule group.
RuleActionOverride.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLRuleActionOverrideDefinition

FieldToMatch.description: Field of the request to match.

SingleQueryArgument.description: One query argument in a web request, identified by name, for example UserName or SalesRegion. The name can be up to 30 characters long and isn't case sensitive.

AllQueryArguments.description: All query arguments of a web request.

UriPath.description: The path component of the URI of a web request. This is the part of a web request that identifies a resource, for example, /images/daily-ad.jpg.

QueryString.description: The query string of a web request. This is the part of a URL that appears after a ? character, if any.

Method.description: The HTTP method of a web request. The method indicates the type of operation that the request is asking the origin to perform.

FieldToMatch.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLFieldToMatchDefinition

JsonBody.description: Inspect the request body as JSON. The request body immediately follows the request headers.
JsonBody.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLJsonBodyDefinition

BodyParsingFallbackBehavior.description: The inspection behavior to fall back to if the JSON in the request body is invalid.
BodyParsingFallbackBehavior.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLBodyParsingFallbackBehaviorDefinition

JsonMatchScope.description: The parts of the JSON to match against using the MatchPattern.
JsonMatchScope.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLJsonMatchScopeDefinition

JsonMatchPattern.description: The pattern to look for in the JSON body.

All.description: Inspect all parts of the web request's JSON body.

JsonMatchPattern.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLJsonMatchPatternDefinition

JsonPointerPath.description: JSON pointer path in the web request's JSON body
JsonPointerPath.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLJsonPointerPathDefinition

RuleActionOverrides.description: Action overrides for rules in the rule group.

OverrideAction.description: Override a RuleGroup or ManagedRuleGroup behavior. This can only be applied to Rule that has RuleGroupReferenceStatement or ManagedRuleGroupReferenceStatement.

None.description: Keep the RuleGroup or ManagedRuleGroup behavior as is.

OverrideAction.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLOverrideActionDefinition

PositionalConstraint.description: Position of the evaluation in the FieldToMatch of request.
PositionalConstraint.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLPositionalConstraintDefinition

Rule.description: Rule of WebACL that contains condition and action.
Rule.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLRuleDefinition

RuleAction.description: Action taken when Rule matches its condition.
RuleAction.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLRuleActionDefinition

CaptchaAction.description: Checks valid token exists with request.
CaptchaAction.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLCaptchaActionDefinition

ChallengeAction.description: Checks that the request has a valid token with an unexpired challenge timestamp and, if not, returns a browser challenge to the client.
ChallengeAction.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLChallengeActionDefinition

ResponseContentType.description: Valid values are TEXT_PLAIN, TEXT_HTML, and APPLICATION_JSON.
ResponseContentType.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLResponseContentTypeDefinition

CustomResponseBodies.description: Custom response key and body map.
CustomResponseBodies.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLCustomResponseBodiesDefinition

RuleActionOverrides.description: Action overrides for rules in the rule group.

RulePriority.description: Priority of the Rule, Rules get evaluated from lower to higher priority.
RulePriority.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLRulePriorityDefinition

Scope.description: Use CLOUDFRONT for CloudFront WebACL, use REGIONAL for Application Load Balancer and API Gateway.
Scope.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLScopeDefinition

SearchString.description: String that is searched to find a match.
SearchString.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLSearchStringDefinition

SearchStringBase64.description: Base64 encoded string that is searched to find a match.
SearchStringBase64.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLSearchStringBase64Definition

Statement.description: First level statement that contains conditions, such as ByteMatch, SizeConstraint, etc
Statement.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLStatementDefinition

TextTransformation.description: Text Transformation on the Search String before match.
TextTransformation.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLTextTransformationDefinition

AWSManagedRulesBotControlRuleSet.description: Configures how to use the Bot Control managed rule group in the web ACL
AWSManagedRulesBotControlRuleSet.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLAWSManagedRulesBotControlRuleSetDefinition

AWSManagedRulesATPRuleSet.description: Configures how to use the Account Takeover Prevention managed rule group in the web ACL
AWSManagedRulesATPRuleSet.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLAWSManagedRulesATPRuleSetDefinition

RequestInspection.description: Configures the inspection of login requests
RequestInspection.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLRequestInspectionDefinition

ResponseInspection.description: Configures the inspection of login responses
ResponseInspection.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLResponseInspectionDefinition

ResponseInspectionStatusCode.description: Response status codes that indicate success or failure of a login request
ResponseInspectionStatusCode.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLResponseInspectionStatusCodeDefinition

ResponseInspectionHeader.description: Response headers that indicate success or failure of a login request
ResponseInspectionHeader.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLResponseInspectionHeaderDefinition

ResponseInspectionBodyContains.description: Response body contents that indicate success or failure of a login request
ResponseInspectionBodyContains.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLResponseInspectionBodyContainsDefinition

ResponseInspectionJson.description: Response JSON that indicate success or failure of a login request
ResponseInspectionJson.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLResponseInspectionJsonDefinition

TokenDomains.description: List of domains to accept in web request tokens, in addition to the domain of the protected resource.
TokenDomains.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLTokenDomainsDefinition

Headers.description: Includes headers of a web request.
Headers.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLHeadersDefinition

Cookies.description: Includes headers of a web request.
Cookies.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLCookiesDefinition

HeaderMatchPattern.description: The pattern to look for in the request headers.

All.description: Inspect all parts of the web request headers.

HeaderMatchPattern.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLHeaderMatchPatternDefinition

CookieMatchPattern.description: The pattern to look for in the request cookies.

All.description: Inspect all parts of the web request cookies.

CookieMatchPattern.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLCookieMatchPatternDefinition

MapMatchScope.description: The parts of the request to match against using the MatchPattern.
MapMatchScope.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLMapMatchScopeDefinition

OversizeHandling.description: Handling of requests containing oversize fields
OversizeHandling.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLOversizeHandlingDefinition

SensitivityLevel.description: Sensitivity Level current only used for sqli match statements.
SensitivityLevel.title: AWSWAFv2WebACLSensitivityLevelDefinition

title: AWSWAFv2WebACLProperties
